title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Yahoo! Finance built research multi-agent systems with Gen AI (SPS321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Yahoo! Finance 如何使用生成式 AI 构建研究多智能体系统 (SPS321)
abstract: Explore how enterprises are adopting and scaling multi-agent systems with Amazon Bedrock and AgentCore for advanced data analysis and research applications. In this session, Dipen Rughwani from Yahoo Finance will share his journey on designing and implementing multi-agent systems for financial question answering. This work investigates methods for orchestrating agents, integrating with Yahoo Finance web services that deliver structured and unstructured data to web and mobile applications. We discuss approaches for enabling coordinated tool/API calling for heterogeneous sources and evaluating performance trade-offs in multi-agent architectures. The session provides practical guidance for architects and data scientists building enterprise-scale agent-based solutions.
abstract_cn: 探索企业如何利用Amazon Bedrock和AgentCore采用和扩展多智能体系统，用于高级数据分析和研究应用。在本次会议中，来自Yahoo Finance的Dipen Rughwani将分享他在设计和实施用于金融问答的多智能体系统方面的经验。这项工作研究了编排智能体的方法，与Yahoo Finance网络服务集成，为网页和移动应用程序提供结构化和非结构化数据。我们讨论了为异构数据源实现协调工具/API调用的方法，以及评估多智能体架构中的性能权衡。本次会议为构建企业级智能体解决方案的架构师和数据科学家提供实用指导。
